Model
Class ShortRead

java.lang.Object
  Model.ShortRead
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ShortRead
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents a particular short read in an input file. This class is used for generating tag files.
